Player History
Drafted in 7th round, 128th overall pick, by Boston in 1965...
Released by Boston on 5/5/1969...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 7/7/1969 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 4/14/1972 with a Dislocated Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Released by Cleveland on 5/22/1972...
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1976...
Injured on 4/2/1979 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 7/19/1979 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 5/19/1980...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1982...
